name: Octorok
description: An Octorok with various color and behavior configurations.

fields.name: Color and Behavior
fields.description: Defines the color and behavior of the Octorok.

3.name: Red (Does not shoot)
3.description: A red Octorok that does not shoot.

4.name: Red (Shoots in all 4 directions)
4.description: A red Octorok that shoots in all 4 directions.
